item.title: StanConnect 2021 - Cognitive Science and Neuroscience session
item.description: Online session of StanConnect 2021 The Cognitive Science and Neuroscience session of StanConnect 2021 happened on November 19, 2021 5:00 pm CET (e.g., Amsterdam) / 11:00 am ET (e.g., New York). For more details about StanConnect 2021 see https://mc-stan.org/events/. Speakers Speaker name Talk Gang Chen Resolving the multiple testing issue in neuroimaging through Bayesian multilevel modeling Kendal Foster and Henrik Singmann Implementation of the Diffusion Decision Model with Across-Trial Variability in the Drift Rate Mike Lawrence It’s complicated: Some observations on the nuanced constraints of the multivariate normal in high dimensions Jan Göttmann Using computational modeling parameters to measure working memory processes Organizers: Session Chair: Bruno Nicenboim - Tilburg University
